entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Spiritwood

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
